name: Ensemble Character
description: Equal-weight characters in ensemble casts where multiple protagonists share the spotlight

prompt.base: Ensemble character, equal importance, group protagonist, shared spotlight, collective story, balanced focus, team member
prompt.positive: ensemble character, equal importance, well-developed personality, distinct appearance, unique traits, group dynamic, shared spotlight, collective story, balanced screen time, team chemistry, individual arc within group narrative
prompt.negative: single protagonist, solo hero, lone character, isolated focus, individual spotlight

technical.screen_time: Equal distribution among ensemble (varies per scene)
technical.character_arc: Individual arc interwoven with group story
technical.visual_prominence: Equal visual weight with other ensemble members

variations.name: Team Ensemble
variations.modifier: coordinated group, team dynamics, collaborative effort, unified goal, complementary skills

variations.name: Family Ensemble
variations.modifier: family unit, related characters, familial bonds, generational dynamics, household focus

variations.name: Diverse Ensemble
variations.modifier: varied backgrounds, different perspectives, contrasting personalities, rich diversity, multiple viewpoints

examples: An ensemble cast of characters with equal importance, group dynamic, balanced focus, team chemistry
Multiple protagonists in ensemble story, shared spotlight, collective narrative, individual arcs
